name: Eeveon
description: The Domesticated Pokémon. It is born from an absence of evolutionary pressure. Scientists believe increasingly more Eevees will evolve into Eeveon as human influence grows.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.description: Once per short rest, you can impose disadvantage on an enemy attack roll of your choice.

abilities.name: Serene Grace
abilities.description: The Move DC to pass a saving throw against one of this Pokémon's moves is increased by 1.
